title: Michio Kaku
summary: Theoretical physicist and co-founder of string field theory, advanced space settlement by popularizing O'Neill colonies and Dyson structures for a broad audience.

title: Andrew Rader

title: Hermann Julius Oberth
summary: Physisist and Engineer, provided the first rigorous scientific proof that rockets could enable human spaceflight, thereby laying the foundation for later concepts of space settlement.
